All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChatController  
    ChatView
    Class that creates teh view of the chats
    ClientManager
    Main class of the client model, it's used to save the data about the client using the program
    Drawing
    Class created to draw different parts of the view
    FileFilter  
    Header
    Class that draws the header of all the windows of the program
    HomeController
    Controller that controls the Chat view and all its buttons
    HomeView
    Class that shows the Home View
    JSONManager
    Class used to read the config.json file which contains the Ip address and the port to connect to the Server
    LoginController
    Controller that controls the Login view and all its buttons
    LogInView
    Class that shows the LogIn View
    Main
    Main class of the project
    Match  
    MessagePanel
    Class that creates the view of the chat itself, it shows the messages between two users
    NetworkManager
    It manages the ip and port for the connection to the server
    ProfileController
    Controller that controls the Profile view and all its buttons
    ProfileView
    Class that shows the Profile View
    RegisterController
    Controller that controls the Login view and all its buttons
    RegisterView
    Class that shows the Register View, the view
    ServerComunication
    Class used to manage the client-server communications
    Transparency  
    WindowController
    Class created to control the close button of the windows
